Generation VIII.Sword: It spits out thread imbued with a frigid sort of energy and uses it to tie its body to branches, disguising itself as an icicle while it sleeps.
Generation VIII.Shield: It eats snow that piles up on the ground. The more snow it eats, the bigger and more impressive the spikes on its back grow.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It eats snow that has accumulated on the ground. It prefers soft, freshly fallen snow, so it will eat its way up a mountain, aiming for the peak.
Generation IX.Violet: Within its internal organs, Snom amplifies the frigid air it gets from eating snow and then uses this amplified air to create icicle-like spikes.

Generation VIII.Sword: Routes 8 and 10 , Lake of Outrage Giant's Cap , Hammerlocke Hills , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Routes 8 and 10 , Lake of Outrage Giant's Cap , Hammerlocke Hills , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Slippery Slope , Snowslide Slope , Path to the Peak Slippery Slope , Snowslide Slope ( Wanderer )

Generation IX.Scarlet: North Province: Dalizapa Passage , Glaseado Mountain Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ ) Trade Flabébé in Cortondo
Generation IX.Violet: North Province: Dalizapa Passage , Glaseado Mountain Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ ) Trade Flabébé in Cortondo

method: Level up (during the night, with high friendship)
